a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Health financing is reported as the annual per capita health expenditure and is adjusted for inflation and price level
differences between countries (measured in 2010 international dollars).
Data source: Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank; Health Expenditure and Financing - OECDstat (2017)
